testCases.name: Functional Application Test
testCases.description: Verify the application has actual functionality beyond basic placeholder
steps: Verify the page loads without errors
Check that it's a luxury fragrance e-commerce site, not just 'Vite + React'
Verify multiple interactive elements exist (navigation, product cards, buttons)
Check for proper branding and professional design
Verify the site has real fragrance products and content
testCases.expectedOutcome: Application shows a fully functional luxury fragrance e-commerce platform with professional design, product catalog, and interactive features
testCases.failureCondition: If page only shows 'Vite + React' placeholder or basic template content, this test should FAIL

testCases.name: Homepage Content and Layout Test
testCases.description: Test that the homepage displays proper luxury fragrance content
steps: Verify top navigation with brand logo and menu items
Look for new arrivals or best sellers sections
Verify footer with company information and links
testCases.expectedOutcome: Homepage displays professional luxury fragrance e-commerce layout with product showcases, navigation, and branding

testCases.name: User Authentication Flow Test
testCases.description: Test user login, registration, and authentication features
steps: Test login with valid credentials: alice.smith@email.com / password123
Verify successful login redirects to account dashboard or homepage
Check that user name appears in navigation/account area
testCases.expectedOutcome: Authentication system works correctly with proper login/logout flow and user session management

testCases.name: Product Catalog and Search Test
testCases.description: Test product browsing, filtering, and search functionality
steps: Verify products are displayed with images, names, and prices
Test search functionality with fragrance-related terms
Try filtering by brand, price, or fragrance family
Click on a product to view detailed product page
Verify product details include fragrance notes, description, sizes
testCases.expectedOutcome: Product catalog displays luxury fragrances with proper filtering, search, and detailed product information

testCases.name: Shopping Cart Functionality Test
testCases.description: Test adding products to cart and cart management
steps: Select a fragrance size (if options available)
Verify cart icon updates with item count
Open cart dropdown or navigate to cart page
Verify product appears in cart with correct details
Test quantity adjustment and item removal
testCases.expectedOutcome: Shopping cart functionality works correctly with proper item management and total calculations

testCases.name: Responsive Design Test
testCases.description: Test application responsiveness across different screen sizes
steps: Verify navigation adapts (hamburger menu on mobile)
Check that product grids adjust appropriately
Verify text remains readable at all sizes
testCases.expectedOutcome: Application displays properly and remains functional across all device sizes

testCases.name: Site Navigation Test
testCases.description: Test all navigation links and menu functionality
steps: Verify all links lead to appropriate pages
testCases.expectedOutcome: All navigation elements work correctly and lead to appropriate pages

testCases.name: Product Detail Page Test
testCases.description: Test individual product page functionality and information display
steps: Navigate to a specific product page
Check product name, brand, and price information
Verify fragrance notes (top, middle, base) are shown
Check for product description and details
testCases.expectedOutcome: Product detail pages display comprehensive fragrance information with functional add-to-cart capability

testCases.name: User Account Management Test
testCases.description: Test user account features and profile management
steps: Verify user information is displayed correctly
Check order history (if any orders exist)
testCases.expectedOutcome: User account features work correctly with proper profile management and order tracking

testCases.name: Fragrance Finder Quiz Test
testCases.description: Test the fragrance discovery quiz and recommendation system
steps: Complete the quiz and view results
Check that recommendations match quiz answers
Test ability to save or act on recommendations
testCases.expectedOutcome: Fragrance finder quiz provides personalized recommendations based on user preferences

testCases.name: Search Functionality Test
testCases.description: Test search capabilities and result accuracy
steps: Use search bar to search for 'Chanel'
Verify search results show relevant products
Test search with fragrance family terms like 'floral'
Try searching for specific fragrance notes
Test search result filtering and sorting
testCases.expectedOutcome: Search functionality returns relevant results and handles various query types appropriately

testCases.name: Wishlist Functionality Test
testCases.description: Test wishlist creation and management features
steps: Test moving items from wishlist to cart
testCases.expectedOutcome: Wishlist functionality allows users to save and manage desired products

testCases.name: Checkout Process Test
testCases.description: Test the checkout flow and order placement process
steps: Verify cart contents are displayed correctly
Test payment method selection (without actual payment)
testCases.expectedOutcome: Checkout process guides users through order placement with proper validation and calculations

testCases.name: Sample Program Test
testCases.description: Test fragrance sample ordering functionality
steps: Add samples to cart or sample order
Test sample set or individual sample selection
testCases.expectedOutcome: Sample program allows users to order fragrance samples with appropriate pricing and options

testCases.name: Gift Services Test
testCases.description: Test gift wrapping, gift cards, and gift-related features
steps: Check gift wrapping options during checkout
Test gift set or curated collection browsing
testCases.expectedOutcome: Gift services provide comprehensive gifting options with proper functionality

testCases.name: Brand Pages Test
testCases.description: Test brand-specific pages and information display
steps: Click on a specific brand (e.g., Chanel, Tom Ford)
Verify brand story and heritage information
Verify brand images and logos display
testCases.expectedOutcome: Brand pages display comprehensive brand information with proper product organization

testCases.name: Customer Service Features Test
testCases.description: Test customer support and help features
testCases.expectedOutcome: Customer service features provide adequate support options and information

testCases.name: Newsletter Signup Test
testCases.description: Test newsletter subscription functionality
steps: Locate newsletter signup form (usually in footer)
testCases.expectedOutcome: Newsletter signup works correctly with proper validation and confirmation

testCases.name: Order Tracking Test
testCases.description: Test order status tracking and history features
steps: Login with user account that has orders
Click on specific order for details
Check order status and tracking information
Test order tracking number lookup (if available)
testCases.expectedOutcome: Order tracking provides accurate status information and order history

testCases.name: Basic Performance Test
testCases.description: Test basic application performance and loading times
steps: Check for console errors or warnings
testCases.expectedOutcome: Application loads quickly and performs smoothly without significant delays or errors

testCases.name: Error Handling Test
testCases.description: Test application error handling and edge cases
steps: Test form submission with invalid data
Check error message display and clarity
testCases.expectedOutcome: Application handles errors gracefully with appropriate user feedback

testCases.name: Basic Accessibility Test
testCases.description: Test basic accessibility features and compliance
steps: Test keyboard navigation through the site
Check for alt text on product images
Verify proper heading structure (H1, H2, etc.)
Verify focus indicators on interactive elements
testCases.expectedOutcome: Application meets basic accessibility standards for inclusive user experience

testCases.name: Data Persistence Test
testCases.description: Test that user data and cart contents persist correctly
steps: Refresh page and verify login persists
Check that user preferences are saved
testCases.expectedOutcome: User data, cart contents, and session information persist correctly across page refreshes and navigation

testCases.name: API Integration Test
testCases.description: Test that frontend properly integrates with backend API
steps: Verify product data loads from API
Check cart operations sync with backend
Verify search results come from API
Test that user profile data loads correctly
Check that orders are properly submitted to backend
Verify error responses are handled appropriately
testCases.expectedOutcome: Frontend successfully integrates with backend API for all major functionality

testCases.name: Luxury Branding and UX Test
testCases.description: Verify the application maintains luxury fragrance branding and user experience
steps: Check overall visual design reflects luxury aesthetic
Check product presentation emphasizes quality and luxury
Verify brand storytelling and heritage content
Check that pricing reflects luxury positioning
Verify sophisticated color scheme and typography
Check for premium user experience elements
testCases.expectedOutcome: Application successfully conveys luxury fragrance brand positioning with appropriate design and content

setup_requirements: Application must be running on http://localhost:5174
Backend API must be running on http://localhost:3001
Database must be initialized with seed data
Test users from test_users.json should be available

test_data.test_products: Chanel No. 5, Tom Ford Oud Wood, Miss Dior Blooming Bouquet, Creed Aventus, Maison Margiela REPLICA Beach Walk

expected_failures.payment_processing: Payment integration may not be fully functional in development
expected_failures.email_sending: Email notifications may not work without proper SMTP configuration
expected_failures.external_apis: Some features requiring external APIs may have limited functionality
